content.question: Which of the following best summarizes the two plans for improving nutrition in Britainâ€™s colonies?

choices.label: Both sources emphasize the need to expand economic production in the colonies.
Both sources emphasize the need to educate farmers in order to improve agricultural practices.
Both sources emphasize the need to respect traditional African economic practices and gender norms.
Both sources emphasize the need to enlist the cooperation of Africans in implementing colonial policies.

content.answer: Both sources emphasize the need to enlist the cooperation of Africans in implementing colonial policies.

skill.text: Skill 3.C: Compare the arguments or main ideas of two sources.
